reuters.title: CINCINNATI BELL <CSN> TO SELL 10-YEAR NOTES
reuters.body:
Cincinnati Bell Inc said it will sell up to 90 mln dlrs of 10-year notes to complete the financing of its acquisition of Auxton Computer Enterprises Inc. It said it plans to issue the notes within the next few months. Cincinnati Bell acquired Auxton on May six. Shearson Lehman Brothers Inc will lead the underwriting group, the company said.
Reuter 
